title: Smart Factory Quality Platform
description: Deploy a Delta Live Tables pipeline for real-time quality monitoring in a semiconductor fab. Features include sensor fusion, SPC analysis, and Feature Store integration for ML-driven defect prediction.
objectives: Implement DLT bronze/silver/gold medallion architecture for manufacturing sensors
Fix broken expectations in DLT pipeline quality checks
Calculate Statistical Process Control (SPC) metrics with correct control limits
Register production feature table in Databricks Feature Store
Build defect prediction features with proper time-travel lookups

scenario.challenge: A chip fabrication plant has deployed thousands of IoT sensors across production lines but lacks real-time quality monitoring. Historical defect rates are 3.2% - above industry standards. Manual SPC charting is too slow to catch process drift. ML models are trained on outdated snapshots instead of live feature tables.
scenario.deployment: 4 DLT notebooks + 3 feature tables (sensor metrics, batch quality, equipment health)

validations.name: DLT Pipeline Health
validations.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as pipeline_count FROM system.livelinessMonitor WHERE pipeline_name = 'manufacturing_quality' AND state = 'RUNNING'
validations.hint: Check DLT pipeline definition - expectations might be causing failures

validations.name: Bronze Sensor Ingestion
validations.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {catalog}.{schema_prefix}_bronze.raw_sensor_readings WHERE timestamp_parsed IS NOT NULL
validations.hint: Verify timestamp parsing logic in bronze layer

validations.name: SPC Metrics Calculation
validations.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {catalog}.{schema_prefix}_silver.spc_metrics WHERE ucl IS NOT NULL AND lcl IS NOT NULL
validations.hint: Check control limit formulas - UCL/LCL should use 3-sigma rule correctly

validations.name: Batch Quality Aggregation
validations.hint: Ensure defect rate calculation is (defects / total_units) * 100

validations.name: Feature Store Registration
validations.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {catalog}.{schema_prefix}_gold.production_metrics_features WHERE batch_id IS NOT NULL
validations.hint: Feature table needs primary key (batch_id) and timestamp key (production_timestamp)

hintsNote: No SQL hints are provided in the notebooks. You must identify the issues and implement fixes using the briefing context and notebook error descriptions only.
